name: Duneworm
description:
Duneworm is a small game in which you are stranded on a desert planet and you have to collect your parts for your ship. 

The game was developed for the ⏱ One Minute Game Jam - the idea behind it is to make a game that has only one minute of gameplay.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Pick up / Throw: E

We hope you have a good Time 😊
